TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装要包括到图像文件中的元数据属性。

span.span: Encapsulates a metadata property to be included in an image file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据组成： 标识符、 属性、 属性类型和指向的属性值的长度 （以字节为单位）。The data consists of: an identifier, the length (in bytes) of the property, the property type, and a pointer to the property value. A不宜可用作独立的对象。A is not intended to be used as a stand-alone object. A对象旨在由派生自的类使用。A object is intended to be used by classes that are derived from . A对象用来检索并更改现有图像文件，无法创建元数据的元数据。A object is used to retrieve and to change the metadata of existing image files, not to create the metadata. 因此，类未定义`Public`构造函数，并且你无法创建的实例对象。Therefore, the class does not have a defined `Public` constructor, and you cannot create an instance of a object. 若要解决缺少`Public`构造函数中，使用现有对象而不是创建的新实例类。To work around the absence of a `Public` constructor, use an existing object instead of creating a new instance of the class. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何读取和显示在图像文件中使用的元数据类和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to read and display the metadata in an image file using the class and the property. 此示例设计要在导入一个 Windows 窗体中使用命名空间。This example is designed to be used in a Windows Form that imports the namespace. 将代码粘贴到窗体和更改的路径`fakePhoto.jpg`使其指向你的系统上图像文件。Paste the code into the form and change the path to `fakePhoto.jpg` to point to an image file on your system. 调用`ExtractMetaData`方法时处理该窗体的事件，并传递`e`作为。Call the `ExtractMetaData` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Id { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置属性的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the property.

value.span: 一个整数，表示属性的 ID。

span.span: The integer that represents the ID of the property.

property tags, see [Image Property Tag Constants](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145387). 有关每个属性标记的说明，请参阅[属性项说明](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145383)。For a description of each MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Len { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 属性的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the length (in bytes) of the property.

value.span: 一个整数，表示 字节数组的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: An integer that represents the length (in bytes) of the byte array.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property short Type { short get(); void set(short value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置整数，它定义 属性包含的数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets an integer that defines the type of data contained in the property.

value.span: 一个整数，定义 包含的数据类型。

span.span: An integer that defines the type of data contained in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示整数和它们所表示的类型。The following table shows integers and the types they represent. |整数Integer|表示的类型Represented Type| |-------------|----------------------| |11|指定是字节数组。Specifies that is an array of bytes.| |22|指定是以 null 结尾的 ASCII 字符串。Specifies that is a null-terminated ASCII string. 如果类型数据成员设置为 ASCII 类型时，应设置属性包括 null 终止符的字符串的长度。If you set the type data member to ASCII type, you should set the property to the length of the string including the null terminator. 例如，字符串"Hello"将具有的长度为 6。For example, the string "Hello" would have a length of 6.| |33|指定是无符号短 （16 位） 整数的数组。Specifies that is an array of unsigned short (16-bit) integers.| |44|指定长时间是无符号的数组 （32 位） 整数。Specifies that is an array of unsigned long (32-bit) integers.| |55|指定数据成员是对无符号长整数的数组。Specifies that data member is an array of pairs of unsigned long integers. 每个对表示的小数部分;第一个整数为分子，第二个整数为分母。Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.| |66|指定是可以保存任何数据类型的值的字节数组。Specifies that is an array of bytes that can hold values of any data type.| |77|指定数组的签名长时间 （32 位） 整数。Specifies that is an array of signed long (32-bit) integers.| |1010|指定是对带符号长整数的数组。Specifies that is an array of pairs of signed long integers. 每个对表示的小数部分;第一个整数为分子，第二个整数为分母。Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.| 有关属性标记的详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的"映像的属性标记常量" http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about property tags, see "Image Property Tag Constants" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Value { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置属性项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property item.

value.span: 一个字节数组，表示属性项的值。

span.span: A byte array that represents the value of the property item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字节数组属性包含几种不同的基元类型之一中的数据。The byte array returned by the property contains data in one of several different primitive types. 若要使用的数据，确定的数据类型使用相应地属性并将转换的字节数组。To use the data, determine the data type using the property and convert the byte array accordingly.
